thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: candice weddington

author: candice weddington
title: candice weddington
text: After just the first month using LOLA, I could already tell a huge difference in how my body responded to these tampons. It's wonderful knowing exactly what I'm putting in my body, and the convenience of having tampons delivered so that I never run out is invaluable. The only drawback to LOLA is the cost, which is about twice that of my old brand. Although it only amounts to a few dollars more a month, I know some women who would be unable to afford the extra expense. That is why I plan to continue my LOLA subscription and to sing the praises of this company in hopes that a higher demand will help drive down the price and make these products accessible to all women, no matter their income.
